trans-unit.source: Represents a specialized text run that can be used to modify properties of text runs within its scope.

The scope of the TextModifier extends to the next matching <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> text run, or to the next <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>.
Note that TextModifier objects can be nested.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> class.

<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> specifies the direction of content flow for text and user interface (UI) elements, and can be either <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection>.
This value is ignored unless the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.HasDirectionalEmbedding%2A> property returns `true`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> supports <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> for the current scope of text.

When the return value is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A> property to determine the direction of content flow for the current scope of text.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> supports <xref href="System.Windows.FlowDirection"></xref> for the current scope of text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> for a text run.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> for a text run, or the return value of ModifyProperties for a nested text modifier.

The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>, subject to further modification by <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier"></xref> objects at outer scopes.
